page.title: 01TERLING VILLAGE REVIEW
page.content: Terling is a picturesque village situated 8 miles north of Chelmsford. It has won the Best Kept Village award three times and has changed very little in outward appearance over the last hundred years or more. This is thanks mainly to the fact that virtually the whole of the village, including the School and the Church and many acres of land is owned by Lord Rayleigh, who lives at Terling Place, and is the figure_head of Lord Rayleighs Farms Inc, who farm the land for miles around. They have a strong influence on the Parish Council and ensure that no new buildings are erected without their consent. Therefore the character of the village with its mainly timber framed houses, some dating back to the 14th Century, remains in tact,although there are some Council and privately owned homes
